mapper.sql: LTGId, Year, Place, LaCode, LaName, LTGdp
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_largetravelgdp where year=#{0} and place=#{1}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_largetravelgdp
LTGId,
Year,
Place,
LaCode,
LaName,
LTGdp,
#{ltgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{laname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ltgdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
mapper.update:
update tbl_largetravelgdp
Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LaCode = #{lacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LaName = #{laname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LTGdp = #{ltgdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where LTGId = #{ltgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_largetravelgdp set Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LaCode = #{lacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LaName = #{laname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LTGdp = #{ltgdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where LTGId = #{ltgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
